name: A pair of shockburned plate boots
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It increases the users electric resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
